Package com.company.utility

Class CryptographyOperations

java.lang.Object
com.company.utility.CryptographyOperations
Direct Known Subclasses:
HardwareSecurityModule
public class CryptographyOperations extends Object
General usage Cryptographic and Hashing functions.

  • Method Details

    • encryptAES

      protected byte[] encryptAES(byte[] data, SecretKey key)
      Function to encrypt byte array data using AES.
      Parameters:
      data - byte array of the data to encrypt.
      key - of type SecretKey, the key to use for encryption.
      Returns:
      finaCipher, of byte array type, or null if exception caught.

    • decryptAES

      protected byte[] decryptAES(byte[] encryptedData, SecretKey key)
      Function to decrypt byte array encrypted data using AES.
      Parameters:
      encryptedData - byte array of the encrypted data to decrypt.
      key - of type SecretKey, the key to use for decryption.
      Returns:
      the decrypted data in byte array format, or null if exception caught.

    • encryptRSA

      protected byte[] encryptRSA(byte[] data, PublicKey publicKey)
      Function to encrypt using RSA.
      Parameters:
      data - byte array of the data to encrypt.
      publicKey - of type PublicKey, the key to use for encryption.
      Returns:
      finaCipher, of byte array type, or null if exception caught.

    • decryptRSA

      protected byte[] decryptRSA(byte[] encryptedData, PrivateKey privateKey)
      Function that decrypts using RSA.
      Parameters:
      encryptedData - byte array of the encrypted data to decrypt.
      privateKey - of type PrivateKey, the key to use for decryption.
      Returns:
      the decrypted data in byte array format, or null if exception caught.

    • signatureRSA

      protected byte[] signatureRSA(byte[] data, PrivateKey privateKey)
      Function to sign using RSA.
      Parameters:
      data - byte array of the data to encrypt.
      privateKey - of type PrivateKey, the key to use for encryption.
      Returns:
      signature, of byte array type, or null if exception caught.

    • checkSignatureRSA

      protected boolean checkSignatureRSA(byte[] data, byte[] signature, PublicKey publicKey)
      Verify the signature by RSA cryptography.
      Parameters:
      data - the byte array of the data to verify.
      signature - the byte array of the signature of the data.
      publicKey - the public key to use to verify the signature.
      Returns:
      true if signature is valid else false.

      protected SecretKey generateKey(int keySize, String algorithm)
      Function to randomly generate keys.
      Parameters:
      keySize - size in bits of the key.
      algorithm - for which algorithm the key is.
      Returns:
      SecretKey randomly generated, or null if exception caught.
